elements.title: During a conversation, we send out many non-verbal signals. Some we use consciously, others we are not aware of. These signals can have a positive or negative effect on a conversation. Discuss the body language behaviors listed below and describe their possible effect on others in keywords according to the example. Be aware that your descriptions are interpretations.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Bend your body and head forward

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Look everyone openly in the eye

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Constantly looking at your cell phone

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Sitting or standing with arms folded

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Hold your hand in front of your mouth when speaking
elements.correctAnswer: Insecurity, fear of saying the wrong thing
